籤詩版本二:
Shiri, littafi, da littafi.Kada ku kuskura kuyi aiki bayan tunani kafin tunani.
Sa'ad da lokaci ya yi, mutane masu daraja za su taimake ku, kuma za ku zauna lafiya kamar gungumen azaba.
詩意:
Wannan gidan hexagram kamar bango ne.
Komai yana da aminci kuma ba tare da haɗari ba.
解曰: Yi sabon abu daga wani tsohon abu. Furen sanyi suna saduwa da bazara. A baya an katange Yanzu na gamsu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Ji ya gargaɗi Ubangiji
A cikin daular Ming, an haifi Liu Ji, wanda sunansa Bowen mai ladabi kuma Wencheng mai suna Wencheng, an haife shi a Qingtian (yanzu lardin Wencheng), Zhejiang.
Yana da kyau karantawa a cikin litattafai da tarihi, kuma ya kware wajen rubuta kasidu da kasidu. Ya kuma kware a fannin ilmin taurari da fasahar soja kuma ya taimaka wa Zhu Yuanzhang wajen hada kan duniya.
A lokacin, Zhu Yuanzhang ya zaɓi ya jagoranci sojojinsa zuwa Anfeng, yana fatan za a sassauta birnin Anfeng da ke kewaye.
Liu Ji ya zo ne don ya rarrashe shi cikin gaggawa, yana mai yanke hukunci cewa za a ci shi idan ya je can. Kamar yadda Liu Ji ya yi tsammani, Zhu Yuanzhang ya makale.
Janar Xu Da da Chang Yuchun ne suka zo don ceto shi, kuma Zhu Yuanzhang ya iya tserewa.
聖意: Sa'a ga gida da gida, ga kai, ga dukiya, ga matsalar ciniki, ga aure, ga mata masu tafiya a Liujia, ga maƙarar tsutsotsin tsiro, ga dabbobi shida, ga gano mutane, ga jinkirin gurfanar da jama'a, ga ƙaura, ga ɓacewa. Dukiya babu tabo, ga cututtuka, ga kaburburan dutsen Yan'an, ga sa'a
第X籤: Wanda ya lashe caca na ashirin da bakwai
